OrgName.entry: AGEWELL GARDENING AND SECURITY PROJECT FOR OLDER PEOPLE

Desc.entry: Project supported by NHS Sheffield, with volunteers (CRB checked) who will cut back overgrown hedges, cut lawns and generally tidy up overgrown and unkempt front gardens. During winter months the volunteers will fit security chains and peep-hole devices to doors. A charge is payable to the volunteers. Self-referrals taken. The project is suspended over winter and will be available again in March. For people aged 50 years and over. Run by Agewell, a registered charity.

DisabledAccess.entry: Chairlift to first floor. Wheelchair and disabled toilet on ground floor.
